sentence: Along with Walker, they include Ohio Senate hopeful Josh Mandel, Trump White House doctor turned Texas congressional candidate Ronny Jackson, Peter Thiel-backed Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters, Alabama gubernatorial challenger and Trump’s former ambassador to Slovenia Lynda Blanchard, and Kelly Tshibaka, who is taking on Trump target Sen. Lisa Murkowski in the Alaska Republican primary.
author: Roger Sollenberger
title: Republicans Are Still Trying to Buy Trump’s Love

sentence: In Ohio, the race has become more combative -- literally -- in recent days, with candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons getting in each other's faces during a debate.
author: Adam Wollner
title: The biggest obstacle Republicans face in the battle for the Senate

sentence: Her rivals, Josh Mandel, JD Vance and Mike Gibbons, are also seeking endorsements.
title: Trump has endorsed nearly 130 candidates for 2022, testing his influence in the Republican Party
